overview:
Alan Hamlyn is CTO for MarketMeSuite, UK based startup that is quickly becoming known as the Marketing Dashboard for Businesses.

Alan is a seasoned programming veteran, with an entrepreneurial mindset, and over 5 years of industry experience. After working for Honda, providing consultancy & web development for local dealerships and creating over Â£3.5 million in sales in just 6 months, making money online came naturally. Building on early success he later moved on to lead developer in Quotatis, a multi-million dollar, multi-national lead generation network.

Aged 19, he started his first business, Wuup Media LTD, a web design business which he ran until early 2010, when he merged the new business Pie Dog Media LTD until present day.

He has written over 200 technical articles on his blog at Wuup.co.uk, ranging from topics on business, programming and SEO, and attracts over 15,000 unique visitors a month and lead to speaking at events as an authority.
